Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Love the friendly staffs. The coffee was delicious, and the their vegan bean burger was just amazing... â€¦

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Great little coffee getaway in this neighborhood. Be wary of the wasps outside though with sunny weather. They just started the business so the service felt a bit clumsy; getting wrong orders or coffee size but still we really enjoyed this place with coffee from "white label".

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Cozy little place with lazy service, if you are in a hurry you don't want to order your coffee here because staff will continue to chat with other customers until they notice you. And here they do not accept Visa/Mastercard as well. What's â€¦

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Excellent service, excellent soup and salad, excellent coffee.

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Great coffee,  great croissants, great banana bread - we went here pretty much every morning during our stay. The local cat, Sushi is also a great addition.

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text:
The French toasts were so good I ended up speaking some French.

We had a great Sunday afternoon lunch with a group of friends. Innovative â€¦

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Chill addition to Bos en Lommer. Take a seat at the window for some people-watching. Coffee is roasted by White Label Coffee and very well priced.

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: A beautiful quaint little cafe on a quiet street. I have only stopped in twice but the few other times I've walked past it is never too busy or too fool. It's a very calm and chilled out place. â€¦

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: My spot for a quick breakfast, pancakes blueberries always a good idea!

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Very cozy and friendly place! You feel like a guest in their own home. And it was my best breakfast in Amsterdam so far for a reasonable price. Thank you!

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: First and foremost I must mention the service.  I spent 5 days around the Amsterdam area and time & time again the service was bare minimum and quite frustrating. Than I visited Samen, and my dissatisfaction with the service quality in â€¦

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: One of the best places to have breakfast or lunch in my neighborhood. Friendly staff, good food and reasonable prices. Good luck in this difficult time guys!

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Just moved into the area and very happy to have found this place. Great coffee (with specialty beans from a local roaster), fresh juice smoothies, sandwiches and salads. Small place, nice terrace out the front and friendly staff. Definitely recommend it.

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: My favorite cafÃ© in this neighborhood! Itâ€™s super cozy with lovely interior. They serve fresh juices, amazing coffee and delicious breakfast and lunch meals with lots of healthy options. My favorites are the cappuccino with hazelnut milk and scrambled eggs and avocado on bread.

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Cosy and delicious !!! Worth a stop for lunch.

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Warm vibe in this locally owned and run joint. Excellent coffee. Wide variety of top notch homemade meals and treats.

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: This is our favourite place in BOLO. Cant get enough of their good coffees. Fresh juices and smoothies and lovely breakfast and lunches. The staff is very friendly with good service. Such a nice vibe going on.

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Lovely place with very nice breakfast food!

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text:
New local hangout in Bos en Lommer.
Really good vibe and range if menu items, including natural smoothies and coffee sourced from Amsterdam roaster, White Label. Great for sunny days!

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Very tasty food and coffee at great prices, with a cute and cosy atmosphere

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Really nice. Friendly staff, relaxed. Very good coffee and a delicious slice of banana bread is what I had.

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Ok, nothing special. Coffee 3/5.

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Very healthy, reasonably priced wonderful small cafe . Excellent service and great food. I  can recommend this place for breakfast or lunch to everyone .

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Simple and elegant. Been coming here for a year now. Almost can't imagine the weekend mornings without Samen :). Great place for coffee, breakfast, and lunch.

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text:
Nice breakfast lunch place.
Very lay back and friendly service
Nice variety of fresh juice and smoothies.
Love it!

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Very cosy, offering one of the best coffee in the area and delicious food.

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Great place for brunches! Good menu, variety of smoothies and a cozy atmosphere.

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Great place for Breakfast and Lunch. I highly recommend the blueberry pancakes.

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Great food, nice juices, and the atmosphere is really welcoming and chill. Love the tuna sandwich!

Name: Samen lunch&juice
Review Text: Tasty food, friendly people, relaxing environment, lots of healthy options (though portions are small - you may be hungry after eating)

Name: Samen lunch&juice
